summary: This is a cover email from a Supervisory Staff Attorney at the New York Metropolitan Correctional Center forwarding a response from Warde to Judge Richard M. Berman's inquiry. The attached letter appears to be a confidential judicial communication regarding the Epstein case.

persons.name: Richard M. Berman
persons.context: Mentioned as the recipient of an attached letter and the source of an inquiry that prompted a response from Warde.

persons.name: Warde
persons.context: Sent a response to Judge Berman's inquiry, which is being forwarded by the Supervisory Staff Attorney.

connections.description: Warde provided a response to Judge Berman's judicial inquiry, indicating a formal legal correspondence relationship.

events.title: Forwarding of Warde's response to Judge Berman
events.description: A Supervisory Staff Attorney at the New York Metropolitan Correctional Center forwarded Warde's response to Judge Richard M. Berman's inquiry via email with an attached letter.

locations: New York Metropolitan Correctional Center, 150 Park Row, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: The document is a cover email dated August 12, 2019, forwarding a confidential letter from Judge Richard M. Berman.
It involves a response from an individual named Warde to a judicial inquiry from Judge Berman.
The correspondence originates from the Supervisory Staff Attorney at the New York Metropolitan Correctional Center.
The document is marked as confidential and part of the SDNY (Southern District of New York) case files.
The timing (August 2019) places this shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's arrest and before his death in custody.
